section.section: The fund shall be in the custody of the Commonwealth. All or any part of these funds may be invested in any securities in which public funds may lawfully be invested. All income derived from investments shall be paid into the fund and become a part thereof. The moneys so invested shall at all times be subject to withdrawal from investment for use as provided in this subsection.
No more than ten percent (10%) of the moneys in the fund shall be expended in any one (1) fiscal year to administer KRS 262.900 to 262.920.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 390, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1994.
